author: cnbc.com
title: Strongbow Exploration Inc.: Corporate Announcement
text:
VANCOUVER, British Columbia, April 06, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Strongbow Exploration Inc. (TSX-V:SBW) (“Strongbow” or the “Company”) reports that Mr. Glenn Kondo will not be assuming the CFO role on June 1 as announced on March 21, 2018.
Mr. Kondo has accepted a role with an international property and infrastructure company.
For additional information please contact: Irene Dorsman at (604) 210 8752 or by e-mail at idorsman@strongbowexploration.com .
Blytheweigh (Financial PR/IR-London) Tel: +44 207 138 3204
Tim Blythe tim.blythe@blytheweigh.com
Camilla Horsfall camilla.horsfall@blytheweigh.com
Nick Elwes nick.elwes@blytheweigh.com
ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS
“Richard D. Williams”
Richard D. Williams, P.Geo
Neither the TSX Venture Exchange nor its Regulation Services Provider (as that term is defined in the policies of the TSX Venture Exchange) accepts responsibility for the adequacy or accuracy of this release.
Source:Strongbow Exploration Inc.
